TopicTitle: Worlds at War - a galactopolitical simulation game

Articles.Content:
"]

Worlds at War is an online browser MMO set in space.

You make a world and the aim of the game is to survive in the galaxy, developing your economy and military to ever-growing heights while keeping your people happy, your rule solid and your world safe.

You can make alliances with other players, take covert action with your spy network, and plan your economic development, along with a bunch of other stuff.

It's in active development, and has been going for a few months now.

However, it's just undergone a reset, and now is the perfect time to join!

A couple of screenshots:

https://i.imgur.com/scCIbKQ.png, https://i.imgur.com/WhF6ywg.png

If you want to take a look, sign up for an account at http://wawgame.eu/register/

Thanks for reading!
